TEXT.BODY: Shr 37 cts vs 41 cts Net 1,214,000 vs 1,316,000 Nine mths Shr 1.06 dlrs Net 3,408,000 vs 2,809,000 Assets 204.8 mln vs 176.6 mln Deposit 154.0 mln vs 131.2 mln Loans 125.3 mln vs 100.7 mln NOTE: 1986 nine mths per share figures not available because bank converted to stock form in June of 1986.
